title: Anonymous, No Teams, Push Denied, Upgrade, Enable Notifications, Add Teams
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed MiLB from App Store

- User is anonymous (didn't log in during onboarding)
- No teams were added during onboarding
- Push notifications were denied/skipped

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user upgrades to the **Test Flight** RC build
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the upgrade is successful
And no crashes are observed

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has **skipped** the **notifications** screen before update

AND the user **enables notifications** from **Settings > Notifications**

And taps Allow in the notifications dialog



![](index.php?/attachments/get/14245756)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Allow notifications toggle will be on
And the MiLB News toggle will be on

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14245757)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has **Denied** notifications before update

AND the user enables notifications from **Settings > Notifications**

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14245758)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Allow notifications toggle will be on
And the MiLB News toggle will be on


![](index.php?/attachments/get/14245757)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user follows teams from **Settings > Follow** teams or from **News>Follow** teams
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then Teams toggles will be off in Setting > Notifications

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14174004)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Repeat step 1 to step 2

When the user Follow team(s)
And enables notifications from **Settings > Notifications**
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the favorite team toggle will be on 
And Followed teams toggles will be off 

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14174005)

title: Sign up
custom_steps: Given the user is on Onboarding > Sign up screen

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the the user enters valid data
And taps **Continue**
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be created
And will be logged in automatically

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user finishes the onboarding
And goes to Settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then newly created user will still be logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on the Allow location access screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then there is a **Skip** and a **Next** button
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14586465)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps **Skip**
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then Location is not allowed
And the user continues on to the next Onboarding step > Follow Teams (Suggested)
And in the Teams near you section there is a **Go to Settings** button there where the user can allow Location 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14586468)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps **Next**
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a location permission dialog appears
And it features the following options:

- Allow Once
- Allow While Using App
- Don't Allow

And the user can't tap outside the modal
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14586467)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps **Allow Once**
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user continues on to the next Onboarding step > Follow Teams (Suggested)
And in the Teams near you section there will either be:

- Teams nearby (if any)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14586471)

- "There are no MiLB teams near you" 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14586466)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user completes onboarding, exits and relaunches the app
And goes to **More tab > Settings > My Teams > Follow More Teams**
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then location is turned off
And in the **Teams near you** section, an **Enable location** button will be available
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14586469)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps **Enable location**
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a location permission dialog appears
And it features the following options:

- Allow Once
- Allow While Using App
- Don't Allow

And the user can't tap outside the modal
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14586470)

title: Location Permission > Allow While Using App

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps **Allow While Using App**
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user continues on to the next Onboarding step > Follow Teams (Suggested)
And in the Teams near you section there will either be:

- Teams nearby (if any)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14586471)

- "There are no MiLB teams near you" 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14586466)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user completes onboarding, exits and relaunches the app
And goes to **More tab > Settings > My Teams > Follow More Teams**
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then Location is still allowed 
And the user sees Teams near you as in step 1

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps **Don't allow**
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user continues on to the next Onboarding step > Follow Teams (Suggested)
And in the **Teams near you** section there is a **Go to settings** button
And no teams nearby
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14586473)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user completes onboarding, exits and relaunches the app
And goes to **More tab > Settings > My Teams > Follow More Teams**
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then location is turned off
And in the **Teams near you section** there is a **Go to settings** button
And no teams nearby
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14586474)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps **Go to settings**
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then they land on the system MiLB settings screen
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14586472)
